entry.title: Pack Your Bags: Non-Binary Biden Official Fired after Allegedly Stealing Luggage from Two Airports

entry.title: Massive Weekend Migrant Caravan Overwhelms Texas Border Town
entry.summary: More than 5,000 migrants arrived at the El Paso processing center over the weekend. The surge is expected to increase once Title 42 is lifted next week.

entry.title: The Future Can Be Bright

entry.summary:
Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This weekâ€™s release was curated by Eric Nantz, with help from the R Weekly team members and contributors. Highlight Read and Visualize your Twitter Archive UPDATE: Successful R-Based Package Submission with Shiny Component to FDA How to score Rock Paper Scissors Insights ChatGPT can Create Datasets, Program in Râ€¦ and when it makes an Error it can Fix that too! Iâ€™m an R user: Quarto or R Markdown? R in the Real World World Cup National Anthems, Emotions & Audio Features
The effect of Childhood Education on Wealth: Modeling with Bayesian Additive Regression Trees (BART) R in Organizations Regaining Momentum with In-Person Meetups R in Academia Just How Good Is ChatGPT in Data Science? Resources Please Avoid deâ€¦

entry.title: Voters Wanted GOP Control of the Senate but Rejected Kooky GOP Candidates
entry.summary: One of the most accurate pollsters of 2022 found voters in key battlegrounds would have preferred GOP control of the upper chamber.

entry.title: Brittney Griner Released from Russian Prison in Swap for Arms Dealer Viktor Bout
entry.summary: Griner was freed in a one-for-one prisoner swap for international arms dealer Viktor Bout.

entry.summary: Times employees are planning to hold a protest outside company headquarters in Manhattan Thursday afternoon.

entry.title: When Human Life Begins
entry.summary: A decisive rebuke of the silliest argument for abortion.

entry.title: Does Nobody Understand How the First Amendment Works?
entry.summary: The antidote to imagined government suppression of speech is not actual government suppression of speech.

entry.title: The Covid Put Is the Greenspan Put on Steroids
entry.summary: When governments try to protect economic agents from the consequences of risky behavior, the risky behavior increases.

entry.title: R Weekly 2022-W49 dplyr, wrapped, JavaScript
entry.summary:
Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This weekâ€™s release was curated by Jonathan Carroll, with help from the RWeekly team members and contributors. Highlight dplyr 1.1.0 is coming soon How to make your own #RStats Wrapped!
How to enhance your Shiny apps with JavaScript (JS) without knowing much JS Insights Some notes about improving base R code Handling larger than memory data with {arrow} and {duckdb} How to make your own #RStats Wrapped! October 2022: â€œTop 40â€ New CRAN Packages dplyr 1.1.0 is coming soon Infinite Scrolling in R Shiny How to make a plot with two different y-axis in R with ggplot2? (a secret ggplot2 hack)
Navigating folders in RStudio: a beginnerâ€™s guide Functional programming explains why containerization is needed for reprodâ€¦

entry.title: R Weekly 2022-W48 Tests from docs, bar plot best practices, RSelenium tutorial
entry.summary:
Hello and welcome to this new issue! How to have (my) content shared by R Weekly? This weekâ€™s release was curated by Tony ElHabr, with help from the R Weekly team members and contributors. Highlight {doctest} 0.1.0: Generate Tests from Examples Using â€˜roxygenâ€™ and â€˜testthatâ€™ A simple checklist for bar plots Webscraping with RSelenium: automate your browser actions Insights A simple checklist for bar plots
